title: IClosedCornerFeatureData.IGetFaces
description: Gets the faces for this closed corner feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces that describe the closed corner VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
